definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Batter can be made a day before and stored in refrigerator!
sentences.chinese: 可以提前一天做好面糊，放在冰箱里就行。

sentences.english: Spread batter into prepared tin and bake for 30 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把面糊倒入烘盘里，铺平，盛入烤箱烘约30分钟。

sentences.english: You can even make cupcakes out of the batter.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可以不用面糊做出波纹蛋糕。

sentences.english: In a flat bottom pan, heat up the oil on medium heat.
sentences.chinese: 中火烧热油锅，热锅，勺入一满大勺的面糊。

sentences.english: They also make sesame candy by pounding the seeds into paste with big hammers.
sentences.chinese: 人们还用大锤子将芝麻压进面糊里做芝麻糖。

sentences.english: When you don't want to see what you're eating, cover it in batter.
sentences.chinese: 当你不想看到你正在吃的东西，就用面糊把它盖住。

sentences.english: Simply melt butter before adding flour to form a roux over medium heat.
sentences.chinese: 将黄油化开，加入面粉，中火调成面糊。

sentences.english: Add the dry ingredients into the butter mixture to form a batter.
sentences.chinese: 把筛好的粉类加入牛油糊中拌匀成面糊。

sentences.english: Add in the coarsely diced apples and spread evenly into the prepared crust.
sentences.chinese: 苹果切成粗丁加入面糊后倒入备好的派饼。

sentences.english: Melt butter in a large pan, pour in the dough and sprinkle in raisins.
sentences.chinese: 牛油入锅融化，倒入拌好的面糊，洒入提子。

sentences.english: Bake the batter for 10-12 minutes, then turn out the cake and leave to cook.
sentences.chinese: 把面糊放入焗炉焗10至12分钟，焗好后取出放凉。

sentences.english: Add the squid and cabbage, mixing well to ensure they are well mixed with the batter.
sentences.chinese: 将切好的卷心菜和乌贼鱼放入面糊，充分搅匀。

sentences.english: Add some seasoning salt to the pancake batter.
sentences.chinese: 加些调味盐进面糊饼里。

sentences.english: Dip the cut fruit into the batter, fry, and roll into cinnamon and sugar.
sentences.chinese: 将切好的水果加入面糊，油炸，然后卷进肉桂和糖里。

sentences.english: Blend in egg yolks until smooth.
sentences.chinese: 加入蛋黄拌成光滑面糊。

sentences.english: Mix sugar and cinnamon and sprinkle 2 tablespoons of sugar mixture over each pan.
sentences.chinese: 混合砂糖和肉桂粉，每个面糊上洒2大勺肉桂糖粉。
